this_title: The Family Business Trump And Taxes
trans_title: 家族企业：特朗普与税收
introduction: Embedded for more than a year inside The New York Times, Carchman and her film crew trail Times investigative reporters David Barstow, Russell Buettner and Susanne Craig as they expose the untold story of how Donald Trump became rich.
chinese_title: 家族企业：特朗普与税收
foreign_title: The Family Business Trump And Taxes
